contextInfo.title: Add Students or Teachers to a Teaching Group

content.code:
You may need to add additional Teachers or Students to a Teaching Group.

  1. Select your Group from the list on the left hand side of the screen.
  2. Click the drop down arrow next to the name of your group (at the top of the right hand panel).
  3. Select Add Teachers or Students to this Teaching Group.
  4. Use the filter or search option to find the student(s) or teacher(s).
  5. Tick the box next to an individual name to add them to the teaching group.
  6. Click the Add button.
